short_summary: Procurement and Delivery of Office Chairs to Ottawa
description: The solicitation is for the purchase and delivery of office furniture to Health Canada in Ottawa.
tags: Procurement and Delivery of Office Chairs to Ottawa
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### [Procurement and Delivery of Office Chairs to Ottawa](#procurement-and-delivery-of-office-chairs-to-ottawa)

**Reference:** PW-22-01010554
**Solicitation Number:** 1000246246
**Publication Date:** October 19, 2022
**Closing Date and Time:** November 4, 2022, 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** October 31, 2022

**Tender Status:**
The tender for the procurement and delivery of office chairs to Ottawa is currently expired.

**Description:**
Health Canada is seeking a supplier for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Ottawa by March 31, 2023. The requirement falls under the PSPC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/xxx/PQ.

**Key Requirement:**
* The supplier must be able to deliver office chairs to a specific location in Ottawa by the designated deadline.
* Health Canada has a requirement for the products to be Canadian-made, as per the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Selection Criteria:**
Please refer to the bid solicitation document for the detailed selection criteria.

**Contract Information:**
* The contracting entity is Health Canada.
* The contract address is: 200, Eglantine Driveway, Tunney's Pasture, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9, Canada.
* Contact information: Christian Belanger, christian.belanger@canada.ca, 613-697-0681.

**Attachments:**
Please refer to the following documents for additional information:
* Solicitation Sollicitation 1000246246 Q&A QR 1: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/26/95d13cb913d163b7c8368f06d798ee65/solicitation_sollicitation_1000246246_q_a_qr_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/26/95d13cb913d163b7c8368f06d798ee65/solicitation_sollicitation_1000246246_q_a_qr_1.pdf)
* RFB Eng F: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/513e72f857b070190ccb1
